title: Projects
text:
Machine Learning

Advanced Regression Techniques with Visual Analytics
In this classic Kaggle project you will follow my workflow, qith tips along the way, developing pipelines on the Extract-Transform-Load phase of the Data Science cycle, as well as a tidy approach on the exploratory data analysis substantialy supported on Visual Analytics.

title: Projects
text:
Deep Learning
It is known that the most common type of dataset found in the industry is the tabular one. In this regard ML and non-parametric, enssemble methods like XGBOOST are king.
However, for datasets with high signal-to-noise (SNR) ratio like image recognition and language translation, DL methods are the best.
